column4: hellos, im having problmes with firefox on ubuntu 8.10 - it __contsantly___ crashes all the time, the windows turns into a shade of grey then i have to force close the application, ive tried a ton of things to fix it, anyone have any suggestions  on how to fix this? why is it so unstable?
i find firefox more stable on ubuntu - do you have many plugins installed in firefox ?
i have firebug installed, but even when disabled she still crashes
